title: Lotion Bottle
description:
A bottle of lotion for the skin, such as moisturizer or sunscreen (sunblock). May be used for other hygienic liquids, including shampoo and body wash, as well as beauty products.

Appearance varies across platforms, but commonly depicted in white and gold colors. Some designs also include a droplet icon on the bottle.

Most platforms feature a bottle with a pump, though others previously displayed a cylinder with a cap.
apple_vendor_description: The lotion bottle emoji on Apple devices presents a sleek, modern design with a pearlescent white finish that catches the light beautifully. Its soft rounded edges and subtle 3D rendering give it a tactile feel, suggesting a premium skincare product. This emoji, with its clean aesthetic, is often used to represent self-care, beauty routines, or the feeling of being refreshed and moisturized.
